text: Todd Lawrence Boehly (born 20 September 1973) is an American businessman and investor. He helped found and is in charge of Eldridge Industries, a holding company located in Greenwich, Connecticut. He is also the temporary chief executive officer of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association and the chairman of Clearlake Capital for club Chelsea. He had a net worth of $8.5 billion in 2024. == References == Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Maryland Category:People from Bethesda, Maryland
title: Todd Boehly
